examples.korean: Can we afford a new car? 발음듣기 우리가 새 차를 살 여유가 돼요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can we afford a new car? 발음

examples.korean: She had a very relaxed manner. 발음듣기 그녀는 태도가 아주 여유가 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had a very relaxed manner. 발음

examples.korean: The director was not available for comment. 발음듣기 소장은 논평을 해 줄 여유가 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The director was not available for comment. 발음

examples.korean: I can afford it, but only just. 발음듣기 나는 그걸 살[할] 여유가 된다. 하지만 간신히 그럴 수 있을 정도이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I can afford it, but only just. 발음

examples.korean: Allow three clear days for the letter to arrive. 발음듣기 편지가 도착할 때까지는 온전히 3일의 여유를 두시오. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Allow three clear days for the letter to arrive. 발음
